item.description:
SAT JUNE 26* 8pm –the classic comedy Arsenic and Old Lace at the Historic Ivoryton Playhouse

20% CT Theatre Group Discount on all advance tickets!

Meet New Friends And Support Arts And Theatre Across Connecticut With The CT Theatre Group Discount
Arsenic and Old Lace
By Joseph Kesselring

A delightful evening of murder and mayhem with eccentric aunts, crazy nephews and bodies in the basement!

Listen to the Ivoryton Playhouse on Spotlight on Connecticut – VISIT http://www.Spotlighto...

Pick up your ticket at the will call window

Tickets are $38 - (Includes Service Charge)

SAVE 20% and get your ticket for $31.50

Pick Up Your Tickets at The Will Call Window

WE HAVE A VERY LIMITED NUMBER OF TICKETS IN THE CT THEATRE GROUP SECTION
THIS EVENT WILL SELL OUT - GET YOUR TICKET NOW

Ivoryton Playhouse
103 Main Street
Ivoryton, CT 06442

The Ivoryton Playhouse is located 15 minutes away from Middletown next to Essex CT

Visit http://www.CTTheatreG... or call (860) 987-7888

Have A Great Time Supporting Connecticut Arts And Theatre With The CT Theatre Group

DIRECTIONS:

From North: Hartford, Middletown:

Take Rte. 9 South. Get off at Exit 4, Middlesex Turnpike/Centerbrook (approximately 18 miles south of Middletown). Turn right at end of exit ramp onto Rte. 154/Main Street. Travel about 7/10 of a mile to the first traffic light. Turn right and travel 1.5 miles to the theatre, located on the right.

From South/West. New York, New Haven:

Get on I-95 North. Get off at Exit 65, Westbrook. Take a left at end of ramp onto Rte. 153. Travel four miles to the third traffic light. At light turn left. At the next light, turn left. The theatre is located one and one-half miles on the right.

From East. New London, Niantic:

Get on I-95 South. Get off at Exit 69. Bear right onto Rte. 9N. Get off at Exit 3. Go left at end of exit ramp. Continue straight through on Rte. 154/ Main Street for approximately two and one-half miles. The theatre is located on the right.

From Old Saybrook:

Get on Rte. 9 North. Get off at Exit 3. At end of exit ramp, take a left. Continue straight through on Rte. 154/Main Street for approximately two and one-half miles. The theatre is located on the right.

Parking is available across the street from the theatre.

Visit http://www.CTTheatreG... or call (860) 987-7888


Be the first to know about our NEW EVENTS – Visit http://www.CTTheatreG... and sign up for our Email Newsletter
item.how_to_find_us: The CT Theatre Group will meet before and after the show to extend the party Details will be emailed to all CT Theatre Group Ticket Holders

group.name: CTMatch Singles Events Music Dance Speed Dating Golf Comedy

item.name: –the classic comedy Arsenic and Old Lace at Ivoryton Playhouse with 20% Discount
